snippet: Any effort to address gun violence must focus first on the inner city.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Prof David Cole contends any effort to address gun violence must focus first on inner cities and disproportionate racial burden gun rights impose; questions whether laxity of nation's gun laws is tolerated because its deadly costs are borne by urban poor and minority populations.
lead_paragraph: Any effort to address gun violence must focus first on the inner city.
